name: Everstake
description: Everstake is one of the world's biggest validators, servicing 735,000+ users across 70+ blockchains. On Ethereum, we handle a share of 2.6 staked supply or 916,000+ ETH from ~18,000 stakers. Everstake has validated Ethereum since PoS genesis, retaining a slashing-free operation. We boast ~99.9 uptime, battle-tested infrastructure and a team of seasoned experts. In EigenLayer, Everstake mission is to secure the most promising AVS and provide the best delegation services for stakers.
